name: pasteurize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to heat something, especially milk, at a controlled temperature for a fixed period of time in order to kill bacteria: The milk is then pasteurized to ensure any dangerous pathogens are eradicated. They use a special belt heater to warm, pasteurize and strain barrels of honey.
More examplesFewer examplesRefrigerated vans transport the milk to central processing plants, where it is pasteurized.UV light can be used to pasteurize fruit juices.The pickles are then pasteurized to prevent the product from fermenting, and quickly cooled.
